title: Refurb deal: Get a 16-inch MacBook Pro with the infamous Touch Bar
description: While this laptop originally sold for $2,399, you can get a refurbished 16-inch MacBook Pro with Touch Bar (2019) for $539.99. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: While this laptop originally sold for $2,399, you can get a refurbished 16-inch MacBook Pro with Touch Bar (2019) for $539.99.
text: Daily deals If you miss the Touch Bar and don't care about Apple Intelligence, you're in luck. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals The only thing standing between most people and their first MacBook Pro (or a much-needed upgrade) is the price. But have you ever thought about grabbing a refurbished MacBook? We only sell ones verified to be in like-new, fully working condition. Take, for instance, this 16-inch refurbished MacBook Pro from 2019 that features the now-discontinued Touch Bar. While it originally retailed for $2,399, you can get a refurbished one here for $539.99 — while supplies last. Refurbished 2019 MacBook Pro features These days, Apple offers two main lines of MacBooks: the Air and the Pro. The Airs are for basic users, while the Pros are laptops for advanced users. This refurbished 16-inch MacBook Pro (2019 model) comes with 16GB of RAM, a 512GB SSD and an Intel Core i7 processor that reaches 2.6GHz. Check out some other notable specs: 16-inch Retina display with True Tone technology Six-speaker sound system Up to 11 hours of battery life Updates to current macOS Note: Because it runs on an Intel processor rather than Apple silicon, this refurbished MacBook Pro with Touch Bar does not support Apple Intelligence. Don’t forget the Touch Bar Some users loved the Touch Bar, and others hated it. This MacBook Pro features the small, customizable touchscreen strip that lives above the keyboard. It replaces the function keys you typically see on laptops, offering a variety of controls that change depending on which apps you have open. For example, you’ll see video playback buttons while streaming movies; typing suggestions when using Microsoft Word; and a color picker in creative design apps. The Touch Bar also offers Siri access and Touch ID for fingerprint log-ins. More about refurbished MacBooks If you usually love thrifting and buying secondhand products, purchasing a refurbished laptop like this one just makes sense. Not only are you saving hundreds on this 16-inch MacBook Pro from 2019, but you’re helping prevent e-waste from entering landfills. This MacBook Pro is nowhere near ready to give up on life. It received a grade “A” refurbished rating, so it’s in like-new condition. You may notice signs of light wear on the body or trackpad, but there will be no imperfections on the screen. Save on a 16-inch refurbished MacBook Pro from 2019 before they’re gone Take home one of these refurbished 2019 MacBook Pros for $539.99 (originally $2,399) while supplies last. html:
• Daily deals

The only thing standing between most people and their first MacBook Pro (or a much-needed upgrade) is the price. But have you ever thought about grabbing a refurbished MacBook? We only sell ones verified to be in like-new, fully working condition. Take, for instance, this 16-inch refurbished MacBook Pro from 2019 that features the now-discontinued Touch Bar.

While it originally retailed for $2,399, you can get a refurbished one here for $539.99 — while supplies last.

Refurbished 2019 MacBook Pro features

These days, Apple offers two main lines of MacBooks: the Air and the Pro. The Airs are for basic users, while the Pros are laptops for advanced users. This refurbished 16-inch MacBook Pro (2019 model) comes with 16GB of RAM, a 512GB SSD and an Intel Core i7 processor that reaches 2.6GHz.

Check out some other notable specs:

  • 16-inch Retina display with True Tone technology
  • Six-speaker sound system
  • Up to 11 hours of battery life
  • Updates to current macOS

Note: Because it runs on an Intel processor rather than Apple silicon, this refurbished MacBook Pro with Touch Bar does not support Apple Intelligence.

Don’t forget the Touch Bar

Some users loved the Touch Bar, and others hated it. This MacBook Pro features the small, customizable touchscreen strip that lives above the keyboard. It replaces the function keys you typically see on laptops, offering a variety of controls that change depending on which apps you have open.

For example, you’ll see video playback buttons while streaming movies; typing suggestions when using Microsoft Word; and a color picker in creative design apps. The Touch Bar also offers Siri access and Touch ID for fingerprint log-ins.

More about refurbished MacBooks

If you usually love thrifting and buying secondhand products, purchasing a refurbished laptop like this one just makes sense. Not only are you saving hundreds on this 16-inch MacBook Pro from 2019, but you’re helping prevent e-waste from entering landfills.

This MacBook Pro is nowhere near ready to give up on life. It received a grade “A” refurbished rating, so it’s in like-new condition. You may notice signs of light wear on the body or trackpad, but there will be no imperfections on the screen.

Save on a 16-inch refurbished MacBook Pro from 2019 before they’re gone

Take home one of these refurbished 2019 MacBook Pros for $539.99 (originally $2,399) while supplies last.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the refurbished 16-inch MacBook Pro with TOuch Bar on January 28, 2025.
